name: Jeweler
description:
Overview

Jewelry maker in an rpg runs around his shop making his tools in order to make the gear he will sell. 

Designers/Analyzers: Robert Martindale, Olivia Schweers, Justin Wu

Goal 

Craft the tools he needs to craft the items he was commissioned

Gameplay

Explore the shop to find the necessary materials and then dive into the menu to craft your tools and items.

Obstacles: Learning more complicated item combinations
Mechanics: Craft different jewelry items, collect items, sell to customer

Art Style / Concept
